idea-plugin.name: Capi Copy
idea-plugin.description:
Capi Copy helps you copy the current fileâ€™s path and content, or all open files, to the clipboard in a format ready for GPT prompts. This is perfect for developers who frequently use AI-powered coding assistants.

Key Features

  • Copy current file path and content.
  • Copy only the selected code if a selection exists.
  • Double-click the shortcut to copy all open files instantly.
  • Configurable options in 'Settings > Tools > Capi Copy Settings'.
  • Default shortcut: Ctrl + Shift + Alt + Q.
